text: 3.3 Kis 24.12, Jer 31.33, Ese 11.19, 36.26, 1 Ko 3.5, Hib 8.10 Mɨj anɨb ak, Klays ne wog nop gɨñon nɨbi anɨgɨpɨm ak nɨŋɨd, ñu kɨl tɨkup. Pen tap ñu kɨl gep ak dɨl, kab pɨs bad adek ak tɨkɨpal tek ma tɨkup. Ne God Kawnan pel mɨdep ak nop agek, binɨb gos kɨlop nab ayaŋ kɨl tɨkup. Anɨb ak nɨbi mɨj tek mɨdebɨm ak, Klays ne kɨl tɨkɨl mɨseŋ yokup.
